title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for h = 50

1 point is earned for d v d t = 0

2 points are earned for differentiation

1 points i earned for r = 2 5

1 points i earned for answer

0 = d V d t = 2 π r h d r d t + π r 2 d h d t ; t = 1 , h = 50  and  so 8 π = π r 2 ⋅ 50 , so  r = 2 5   Therefore  0 = 2 π ( 2 5 ) ( 50 ) d r d t + π ( 2 5 ) 2 ( 18 ) = π ( 40 d r d t + 72 25 ) d r d t = − 9 125 in / min

or

V = 8 π = π r 2 h ,  so  r = 8 h Therefore  d r d t = 1 2 ( 8 h ) − 1 2 ⋅ ( − 8 h 2 ) ⋅ ( d h d t ) a t  t =1,  h = 50   so  d r d t = 1 2 ( 8 50 ) − 1 2 ( − 8 2500 ) . ( 18 ) = − 9 125 in/min
